notes: Grind the ingredients into a fine powder and soak in 30 percent Cresol and Soap Solution (150ml), 95 percent alcohol (50m) and castor oil (20ml) for five days. The medication is then applied Externally directly on the lesions with gauze or cotton buds, three to four times a day for seven days.
